resources.string: Sygic Travel will not start on generic devices, like emulator.
Location needed to show what\'s around and for navigation.
We use your contacts so that you can share trips with your friends.
We store photos, maps and other data for faster and offline access.
Sygic Travel needs your location to show you what\'s best around and help you navigate in your destination.
You can easily invite people from your contacts to your trip.
Sygic Travel needs access to your storage to save photos, maps and other data for faster and offline access.
One day in add to trip calendar
Indicates, that there is a hotel added in that day
Opens Sygic Travel in Google Play
No weather information for this day available
Navigation information - estimated distance and time to arrival.
Icon that indicates whether this item is in trip, or in favorites.
Find cool things to see & do on your trips. Anywhere around the world. With powerful search and filtering.
Create a day-by-day travel itinerary for your trip. Let us factor in the travel time and instantly see how demanding each day is going to be.
Follow your daily plan and never lose your way with built-in walking guidance. Add offline capability (available with Sygic Travel Premium) and enjoy your trip.
By signing up, you confirm that you have read, understood and agreed with
Are you sure you want to sign out?
We\'ve sent you an email with a link to reset your password.
We need your email in order to sign you in. Do you want to grant the permission now?
Signing in is not available offline.
Unexpected error while logging in. Sorry about that. Please try again. If the problem persists, please contact our support team for help.
Please fill in your email address.
The username is too short. It must be at least %1$d characters long.
The password is too short. It must be at least %1$d characters long.
Invalid email entered. Please make sure that you have typed it in correctly.
Your session has expired, thus you have been signed out.
Invalid email entered. Please make sure that you have typed it in correctly.
Invalid email or password. Please make sure that you have entered your credentials correctly and try again.
Since you have upgraded to the new Sygic Account, your old Sygic Travel account password is no longer valid. Please use the password for your new Sygic Account.
Unexpected error while logging in. Sorry about that. Please try again. If the problem persists, please contact our support team for help.
A Sygic Account with this email already exists. Continue to sign-in. You can also reset your password in case you forgot it.
No account with this email found. Please make sure that you have entered it correctly.
Cannot connect to Google services. Sorry about that. Please try again. If the problem persists, please contact our support team for help.
"Are you sure you want to remove %1$s from your trip?"
"Nothing to show here.\nWanna plan something new?"
This action requires internet connection. Please connect to the internet.
New day has been added to the itinerary
Day has been removed from the itinerary
Log in to join the trip!
Trip cannot end before it starts.
Trip is too long (80 days is maximum).
Some features of Sygic Travel work better with known dates. Please set your start date as soon as you know it.
You can define the length of your trip by adding days later in Itinerary.
Create trip in my current location
Your current location is unknown. Enable GPS and wait for your current location.
Start with an empty trip and build your own itinerary.
With a free Sygic Travel account you will be able to edit your trips on the web, share trips with people going with you and sync trips across all your devices.
"Add %1$s as another destination to your trip?"

A problem has occurred while deleting the offline data folder.
"You are offline. Connect to the internet to\ndownload the offline map."
Your offline content is outdated. Please re-download the outdated offline maps to ensure that you can use the app offline.
An error occurred. Please, try again.
There\'s not enough storage on your device. Please, free up at least %1$d %2$s and try again.
You are connected via Mobile Data. Downloading this package can incur additional charges. Do you want to proceed?
Are you sure you want to reset your trip? All the data in your trip will be deleted.
Only you can access your private trips.
Anyone who has the link can view your shareable trip.
Sorry, you are not allowed to modify this trip.
The owner of this trip has not allowed you to share it.

Do a one-tap sign in to backup your trip and sync it across all your devices. It\'s free!
You must be a registered user to upload new photos.
You must register to be able to suggest places.

Items are sorted by popularity. Use filters and search to narrow down the list.
Welcome to your itinerary! Tap any day to start planning your trip. Drag and drop any day to delete it from your itinerary.
Use the button to add an item to your itinerary. Tap again to delete or add to another day.
Drag and drop items to edit your itinerary.
Please help our content team by filling out as much as you can.
Any message for our content team?
Something went wrong. I did not get params.

To adjust the length of your trip, add or remove days in Itinerary.
Download the full-fledged Sygic Travel app for free and plan your trips all around the world.
Get unlimited worldwide offline maps with search and walking guidance. Read premium content by Fodor\'s Travel.
Use the app offline anywhere in the world.
Get offline walking navigation and search.
Read lots of detailed practical information, sourced from Fodor\'s Travel.
Your Premium account on Sygic Travel has been activated.

Love your gifts? Please rate our app so we can give you more.

The image is too small. Minimal size is 600x600 pixels.

A newer version of \"%1$s\" edited by %2$s on %3$s is available on the server and your pending local changes cannot be merged. Choose a version to keep.
Your offline data needs to be downloaded again.

This update brings brand new vector-based map to Sygic Travel. Unfortunately, we had to delete your previously downloaded offline maps. In order to use the app offline, you\'ll have to download the offline maps again. Sorry about that.
